text: The First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba () is the de facto leader of Cuba. The First Secretary is the highest office within the Communist Party of Cuba as well as ranking first in the Politburo, the highest decision-making body in Cuba, which makes the office holder the most powerful person in the Cuban government. ==Officeholders== Portrait Name (Born-Died) Term Term Term Second Secretary Portrait Name (Born-Died) Took office Left office Duration Second Secretary General
